name: Kaywin C. SHADRON, Executrix of the Will of Mia D. Foster, Deceased v. Scott C. FOSTER; Kyle Foster, a Minor Child v. Scott C. Foster. Petition of Scott C. Foster

parties: Kaywin C. SHADRON, Executrix of the Will of Mia D. Foster, Deceased v. Scott C. FOSTER. Kyle Foster, a Minor Child v. Scott C. Foster. Petition of Scott C. Foster.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 13th day of July, 2010, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby treated as a Petition for Review, as this matter involves a challenge to the Superior Court’s order quashing and dismissing Petitioner’s appeal. See Vaccone v. Syken, 587 Pa. 380, 384 n. 2, 899 A.2d 1103, 1106 n. 2 (2006). The order of the Superior Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
997 A.2d 337
Kaywin C. SHADRON, Executrix of the Will of Mia D. Foster, Deceased v. Scott C. FOSTER. Kyle Foster, a Minor Child v. Scott C. Foster. Petition of Scott C. Foster.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 13, 2010.
